markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Harrow Mat](/Equipment.aspx?ID=825)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #160: Assault on Hunting Lodge Seven](/Sources.aspx?ID=49) pg. 66</row>

**Price** 8 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 2

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This leather mat bears intricate designs and symbols embossed into them to enhance the mystique of a harrow reading. The mat provides a +1 item bonus to [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5), [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6), and relevant [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) checks (such as Fortune-Telling Lore or Harrow Lore) to convince a creature that a harrow reading was accurate.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Harrow Mat
